art.name: E
art.descr: Capable of trigger intents and actions based on url. Apks and img are written to SD bycalling n-class functions.

art.name: n
art.descr: It's able to write to sd, images and apks.

art.name: y
art.descr: load files from an url and can write it to the database.

art.name: b
art.descr: has an undecompilable code that sets up an http client and a proxy. Potential download of an AD.

art.name: R
art.descr: using FSAd. Respond to bytes recieved and decrypt them.

art.name: m
art.descr: need Read Phone State Permission. Sensitive data exfiltration?
